actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal employee health insurance provisions of title 5, United States Code, to require that notice and hearing be provided before the effective date of any reduction of health benefits, any increase of premium payment charges or any exclusion of any type of provider of health services.

summary.text: Requires that notice and hearing be provided before the effective date of any reduction of health benefits, any increase of premium payment charges, or any exclusion of any type of provider of health services under the Federal employees health insurance programs. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8902)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal employee health insurance provisions of title 5, United States Code, to require that notice and hearing be provided before the effective date of any reduction of health benefits, any increase of premium payment charges or any exclusion of any type of provider of health services.
